task.title: Joining a meeting
task.shortdesc: You can join an in-progress meeting to which an owner has invited you.

taskbody.context: Depending on the type of meeting, you might not gain access to the meeting right away. If the meeting owner selected to admit participants, you first enter a waiting room until a meeting moderator admits you into the meeting or declines your admission.

step.cmd: Type the meeting name or locate the meeting on the Scheduled tab.

info.note: If the meetings has not started and you are a moderator for the meeting, Start is displayed and you can start the meeting.
